post_text: Just.a reminder of the academic and athletic excellence Smothers Academy Preparatory School For Boys demanded from its young men. Trophies in chess, football, basketball, baseball, and track! .... If given the opportunity we most definitely would have excelled in the academic decathlon. Never let anyone control your history or your future. Be the ‚Äúthe masters of your fate and the captains of your soul‚Äù It Matters!! Keep striving for perfection and remain obedient to God and watch Him remove all barriers and surround you with good folks who love all children especially Black Boys!! See you in a few months for the grand re-opening !! Geaux Huskies!!

post_text: Perspective Smothers Academy Parents. We pray that all is well with you and your families during this difficult moment in history. The time has come for Smothers Academy Preparatory School For Boys to finalize its reorganization as a private school. We are committed to following God‚Äôs will of educating young men with the principles of Courage, Honor, Intelligence, Perseverance, and Fraternity. In order to proceed with the reopening, we need input from interested parents to solidify the actual opening date, grade levels that will be served, facility needs and appropriate staffing. Please visit the Smothers Academy website, www.SmothersAcademy.com, click on the Parents drop down menu, then Perspective Parents, then Student Interest Form. Please continue to look at the News and Announcements section on the website regarding more specifics of the conversion, cost, timetables etc., as this will be updated regularly. We are humbled and honored to have this opportunity to resurrect this great institution. Stay Safe and God Bless you all.

post_text: To all of our Smothers Academy supporters, followers, family and friends. Thank you for your continued prayers and support. We will stay the course, fight the lies, and defeat the devil. God has won the fight already!!!!!

post_text: Hello family.... Thursday was both an exciting and emotional day at Smothers Academy. We broke ground for our modular building!!! Ready or not, 8th grade here we come!!! The moment was shared with 5th, 6th and 7th grade students. 10 new classrooms for our Middle School Huskies! We are bursting at the seams with phenomenal, courageous, brilliant young men. We love our boys. Geaux Huskies!!!!

The administrators lead with love and by example.......NOBODY DOES IT BETTER!!! Geaux Huskies.

post_text: Hello family and friends of Smothers Academy Home of the Huskies this Saturday 9/24 we will be on our way to play our first official football game of the year we have made plans to get a bus going for parents and other family members who may need transportation or just want to ride the bus to save from driving and finding parking when we arrive at the games the cost will be $5.00 per person that will include your ride to and from the game pick up and drop off location will be at the school we will pull out the same time as the boys which should be around 12:30pm if you are interested or have any questions contact me via email: blkjdfldf3@gmail.com or inbox me again my name is Brittany Kelly-Ford Booster Club

post_text:
Nelson Mandela said, "It always seems impossible until it is done."
Thank you to all those helping hands and hearts for painting, decorating, donating, trimming trees, pressure washing, planting flowers and sending well wishes our way.
7 hours and 42 minutes before our first bell.

This is only the beginning, we are prepared for and committed to SAVING A GENERATION.....ONE CHILD AT A TIME.

Welcome Husky Family!!!!! Let me hear you HOWL!!!

post_text:
We can't thank the barbers enough for their generosity. They stayed well past 5p to ensure every Husky that showed up walked away so fresh and so clean. Today our young men not only received a free haircut but also a lesson in service, the importance and joy of giving back and lastly, true brotherhood personified.
Geaux BARBERS......GEAUX HUSKIES!!!

50 clients serviced today.....be on the look out for distinguished gentlemen tomorrow.

post_text:
Football practice was amazing, the boys are excited, having fun AND learning. They are learning not only the fundamentals of the sport but also the building blocks of CHARACTER!!
Courage, Honor, Intelligence, Perseverance and Fraternity.
The parents are out in full force and the coaching staff is exceptional. The HUSKIES are coming for you!!!

post_text:
Get ready, get ready, get ready!!!! We are preparing for our college grads, our lawyers, our doctors, our activists, entrepreneurs, future educators, scientists, astronauts!!!! Whatever their dream....we are setting them on the path to achieve.
They will walk into their classrooms to these ROYAL PURPLE chairs fit to hold kings and put their legs under these MAPLE desks the launching pads on top of which they will begin designing their futures....our futures. Aren't you excited to be a HUSKY???!!!!! Let me hear you HOWL!!!

post_text: Standing room only!! The staff is ready, the parents are ready--- the informational was more than anyone expected. We ARE the Smothers Academy family!! All we do is WIN!!! If you were unable to make it out....you better ask somebody.

post_text:
The Smothers Academy Parent Informational was an outstanding event! We were truly delighted and honored to see all the support from our Husky Parents and Guardians. Family.....we are who we say we are, and we are unapologetic, confident and committed to EXCELLENCE. Thank you...Thank you...Thank you for allowing us to educate your children and giving us the permission to help you raise your boys into men!!! Please continue to pray for this organization and our Smothers Sons!! ONE BODY ONE FAMILY!!!

Let Me Hear You Howl!!!
Let Me Hear You Bark!!!
Geaux Huskies!!!

post_text: Happy Father's Day to all Husky Fathers, Grandfathers, Uncles, Brothers and every positive male figure in our young men's lives. We love and support you. We appreciate all the hard work you have done thus far. Happy Father's Day to all you moms who fill the void and hold it down. We love and appreciate you too! See you on Wednesday night at 6pm. Geaux Huskies!!

post_text: Jefferson Parish Public School District unanimously voted to enter into a lease agreement with Smothers Academy for the Norbert Rillieux building in Waggaman, LA. Yes we have the building!! Now for the rebuild. Thank you for the support and prayers!! August 22, 2016 here we come.
text: Jefferson Parish Public School District unanimously voted to enter into a lease agreement with Smothers Academy for the Norbert Rillieux building in Waggaman, LA. Yes we have the building!! Now for the rebuild. Thank you for the support and prayers!! August 22, 2016 here we come.
